oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Martí Blasco, Pablo
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The idea of this project is to study the systems of fault diagnosis in discrete event systems. A classification of the systems will be explained. Finally two practical cases of an automatic system will be proposed and studied with one of the methods.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Universidad de Zaragoza; Departamento de Informática e Ingeniería de Sistemas; Área de Ingeniería de Sistemas y Automática
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Graduado en Ingeniería de Tecnologías Industriales
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Diagnosis basada en modelo - Aplicada a modelos de Matlab Stateflow
Model-based diagnosis - Application to Matlab Stateflow models
